original_text:
Would not his splendor terrify you?
    Would not the dread of him fall on you?
korean_text: 그의 존귀가 너희를 두렵게 하지 않겠으며 그의 두려움이 너희 위에 임하지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Would not his splendor terrify you?
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 영광이 너를 두렵게 하지 않겠느냐?

sentences.original_text: Would not the dread of him fall on you?
